summary: This document is a Global Master Repurchase Agreement between Deutsche Bank AG and Southern Trust Company, Inc., outlining the terms and conditions for repurchase transactions. It includes provisions for various types of transactions, definitions, and responsibilities of the parties involved, as well as specific annexes for different types of securities and transactions.

persons.name: Mary Breslin
persons.context: Mary Breslin is identified as a signatory for Deutsche Bank AG in the agreement.

persons.name: Cynthia Cuomo
persons.context: Cynthia Cuomo is identified as a signatory for Southern Trust Company, Inc. in the agreement.

connections.description: Both are signatories representing their respective companies in the agreement.
Cynthia Cuomo is associated with Southern Trust Company, Inc., where Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as a contact.

keyFacts: The agreement is a Global Master Repurchase Agreement dated February 26, 2015.
It outlines the terms for repurchase transactions between Deutsche Bank AG and Southern Trust Company, Inc.
Specific annexes detail terms for transactions involving different types of securities, including equities and Italian bonds.
